DOC.detailed_description: Evaluate subject prospective observational study subject screen administer scientifically validated questionnaire study entry observation period specify interval determine affect Portable Oxygen Concentrator improvement exercise capability , dyspnea quality life primary endpoint , utilize Baseline Dyspnea Index ( BDI ) , Transitional Dyspnea Index ( TDI ) , Chronic Respiratory Disease Questionnaire ( CRQ ) six minute walk test ( 6MWT ) . The secondary endpoint rate exacerbation , sleep quality ( report number hour sleep improvement ; utilize Epworth Sleepiness Scale [ ESS ] ) , health care utilization ( emergency room encounter , hospital admission ) .
